Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Continental Genova, you'll be centrally located in Genoa, steps from Christopher Columbus Monument and Piazza Acquaverde. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Royal Palace and Castello d'Albertis.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional features include babysitting/childcare, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Continental Genova, you'll be centrally located in Genoa, steps from Christopher Columbus Monument and Piazza Acquaverde. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Royal Palace and Castello d'Albertis.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Christopher Columbus Monument - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza Acquaverde - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Castello d'Albertis - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of World Cultures - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Galata Maritime Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
University of Genoa - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Prince's Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
The Bigo Lift - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Palazzo di San Giorgio - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Aquarium of Genoa - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
National Ligurian Gallery at the Spinola Palace - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
White Palace - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Grimaldi Palace - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Citta Dei Bambini Children's Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Genoa (GOA-Cristoforo Colombo) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 397.3 km / 246.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Continental Genova is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airport to Hotel Continental Genova is Genoa (GOA-Cristoforo Colombo) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi.
